entry.name: dk-bib
entry.caption: Danish variants of standard BibTeX styles.
entry.description:
Dk-bib is a translation of the four standard BibTeX style files (abbrv, alpha, plain and unsrt) and apalike into Danish.
The files have been extended with URL, ISBN, ISSN, annote and printing fields which can be enabled through a LaTeX style file.
Danish sorting order files for BibTeX8 is also included.
